actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide additional dental care for dependents of members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Provides necessary dental care for dependents of active duty members of the uniformed services. Sets guidelines as to the deductible provisions of insurance plans to cover the dental expense and provides plans for the complete dental care of such dependents. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1079(g))

titles.title: A bill to provide additional dental care for dependents of members of the uniformed services.
